comments.body: When will `dt` not be in `resolved.prior`? I was expecting that it would always be added after the call to `covariantVars`.
Iff the type doesn't have any type variables that are referenced in its definition, it won't be in `prior`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +62,66 @@        resolved.prior.getOrElse(
          dt,
          ei.typeDecls.getOrElse(dt, sys.error(s"$dt not found")).`type`.typeVars map (_ =>
            Covariant
          ),

comments.body: ummmm... I guess it compiles and does the right thing :) but I have no idea what it does.
